summary: A rich kid becomes the self-appointed psychiatrist to the student body of his new high school.
cast: Anton Yelchin|Robert Downey Jr.|Hope Davis|Kat Dennings|Tyler Hilton|Mark Rendall|Dylan Taylor|Megan Park|Jake Epstein|Jonathan Malen|Derek McGrath|Stephen Young|Ishan Davé|David Lawrence Brown|Eric Fink|Noam Jenkins|Lauren Collins|Annick Obonsawin|Sarah Gadon|Drake|Michael D'Ascenzo|Dwayne McLean|Quancetia Hamilton|Richard Alan Campbell|Kim Roberts|David Fraser|Marvin Karon|Brendan Murray|Abigail Bernardez|Laura Jeanes|Annamaria Janice McAndrew|Amelia Tenttave|Amabelle Singson|Julia Cohen|Abby Zotz|Maddy Wilde|Airick Woodhead|Dorian Wolf|Daniel Woodhead
title: Charlie Bartlett
